name: Match an if statement
description:
Matches an if statement to a regex pattern.

To use simply change YOUR_WORD_HERE for ay word
content:
if (this === "footwear") : null; endif;
if (this <= "footwear"
if (this != "footwear"
if (null % "footwear"
if (null xor "footwear"
if and "footwear"
if or "footwear"
if || "footwear"
if && "footwear"
if - "footwear"
if / "footwear"
if * "footwear"
if + "footwear"
null if "footwear"
if "footwear"
footwear
null footwear yes
author: Samuel G Swift
